citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 22-FEB-
21. Licensee was contacted by phone and stated no adult would be available at that time.
End Section
